items.content_html: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.
items.title: himanshuverma8/hvcustomlinktree: A simple link aggregation tool built with React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Inspired by Linktree, it helps organize and share links on a single, customizable page. Lightweight, responsive, and perfect for personal use.Input component can be used by anyone just by modifying the parameters.

items.content_html: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure.
items.title: adham025/Dynamic-JSON-Server-CRUD: This repository provides a lightweight, REST API powered by JSON Server, designed to handle dynamic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a simple JSON-based database. It allows developers to quickly spin up a full API for testing, prototyping, and front-end development without the need for a real database or backend infrastructure.

items.content_html: A lightweight dependency injection container that allows you to register and resolve dependencies in your application. It supports both lazy and non-lazy dependencies, as well as resolving chain dependencies.
